verses.verse: לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יִ֠הְיֶה <WH1961> shall have לַכֹּהֲנִ֨ים <WH3548> The priests הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> the Levites כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole שֵׁ֧בֶט <WH7626> [and] all the tribe לֵוִ֛י <WH3878> of Levi חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> shall have no part וְנַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> nor inheritance עִם־ <WH5973> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> with Israel אִשֵּׁ֧י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> and his inheritance יֹאכֵלֽוּן׃ <WH398> they shall eat

וְנַחֲלָ֥ה <WH5159> Therefore shall they have no inheritance לֹא־ <WH3808> no יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> shall have לּ֖וֹ בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> among אֶחָ֑יו <WH251> their brethren יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD ה֣וּא <WH1931> he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> [is] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> as he hath said לֽוֹ׃ ס

וְזֶ֡ה <WH2088> now this יִהְיֶה֩ <WH1961> become מִשְׁפַּ֨ט <WH4941> due הַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> And this shall be the priest's מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> from the people מֵאֵ֛ת <WH853> זֹבְחֵ֥י <WH2076> from them that offer הַזֶּ֖בַח <WH2077> a sacrifice אִם־ <WH518> either שׁ֣וֹר <WH7794> whether [it be] ox אִם־ <WH518> or שֶׂ֑ה <WH7716> or sheep וְנָתַן֙ <WH5414> and they shall give לַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> unto the priest הַזְּרֹ֥עַ <WH2220> the shoulder וְהַלְּחָיַ֖יִם <WH3895> and the two cheeks וְהַקֵּבָֽה׃ <WH6896> and the maw

רֵאשִׁ֨ית <WH7225> The firstfruit דְּגָֽנְךָ֜ <WH1715> [also] of thy corn תִּֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <WH8492> of thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֗ךָ <WH3323> and of thine oil וְרֵאשִׁ֛ית <WH7225> and the first גֵּ֥ז <WH1488> of the fleece צֹאנְךָ֖ <WH6629> of thy sheep תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> shalt thou give לּֽוֹ׃

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ב֗וֹ בָּחַ֛ר <WH977> hath chosen יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all שְׁבָטֶ֑יךָ <WH7626> him out of all thy tribes לַעֲמֹ֨ד <WH5975> to stand לְשָׁרֵ֧ת <WH8334> to minister בְּשֵׁם־ <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD ה֥וּא <WH1931> him וּבָנָ֖יו <WH1121> him and his sons כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> for ever ס

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> now if יָבֹ֨א <WH935> come הַלֵּוִ֜י <WH3881> And if a Levite מֵאַחַ֤ד <WH259> from any שְׁעָרֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH8179> of thy gates מִכָּל־ <WH3605> whenever יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> out of all Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ה֖וּא <WH1931> he גָּ֣ר <WH1481> where he sojourned שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it וּבָא֙ <WH935> and come בְּכָל־ <WH3605> whenever אַוַּ֣ת <WH185> with all the desire נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <WH5315> of his mind אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> unto the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֥ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

וְשֵׁרֵ֕ת <WH8334> Then he shall minister בְּשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> his God כְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> as all his brethren הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> the Levites הָעֹמְדִ֥ים <WH5975> [do] which stand שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> there before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> They shall have like portions כְּחֵ֖לֶק <WH2506> portions יֹאכֵ֑לוּ <WH398> to eat לְבַ֥ד <WH905> except מִמְכָּרָ֖יו <WH4465> beside that which cometh of the sale עַל־ <WH5921> of הָאָבֽוֹת׃ <WH1> of his patrimony ס

כִּ֤י <WH3588> When אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you בָּ֣א <WH935> When thou art come אֶל־ <WH413> about הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָ֑ךְ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִלְמַ֣ד <WH3925> thee thou shalt not learn לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּתוֹעֲבֹ֖ת <WH8441> after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> of those nations הָהֵֽם׃ <WH1992> of those

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִמָּצֵ֣א <WH4672> There shall not be found בְךָ֔ מַעֲבִ֥יר <WH5674> to pass בְּנֽוֹ־ <WH1121> among you [any one] that maketh his son וּבִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> or his daughter בָּאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> through the fire קֹסֵ֣ם <WH7081> divination קְסָמִ֔ים <WH7080> [or] that useth מְעוֹנֵ֥ן <WH6049> [or] an observer of times וּמְנַחֵ֖שׁ <WH5172> or an enchanter וּמְכַשֵּֽׁף׃ <WH3784> or a witch

וְחֹבֵ֖ר <WH2266> casts חָ֑בֶר <WH2267> A spell וְשֹׁאֵ֥ל <WH7592> or a consulter אוֹב֙ <WH178> with familiar spirits וְיִדְּעֹנִ֔י <WH3049> or a wizard וְדֹרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> calls אֶל־ <WH413> up הַמֵּתִֽים׃ <WH4191> the dead

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תוֹעֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> these things [are] an abomination יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> whoever עֹ֣שֵׂה <WH6213> For all that do אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וּבִגְלַל֙ <WH1558> and because הַתּוֹעֵבֹ֣ת <WH8441> of these abominations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> things יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God מוֹרִ֥ישׁ <WH3423> doth drive them out אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִפָּנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> from before
תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> Thou shalt be perfect תִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> become עִ֖ם <WH5973> before יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> with the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God ס

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> For these nations הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> those אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which אַתָּה֙ <WH859> you יוֹרֵ֣שׁ <WH3423> which thou shalt possess אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to מְעֹנְנִ֥ים <WH6049> unto observers of times וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to קֹסְמִ֖ים <WH7080> and unto diviners יִשְׁמָ֑עוּ <WH8085> hearkened וְאַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> not כֵ֔ן <WH3651> so נָ֥תַן <WH5414> hath not suffered לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> but as for thee the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

נָבִ֨יא <WH5030> unto thee a Prophet מִקִּרְבְּךָ֤ <WH7130> from the midst מֵאַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> of thee of thy brethren כָּמֹ֔נִי <WH3644> like יָקִ֥ים <WH6965> will raise up לְךָ֖ יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about תִּשְׁמָעֽוּן׃ <WH8085> like unto me unto him ye shall hearken

כְּכֹ֨ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you שָׁאַ֜לְתָּ <WH7592> According to all that thou desiredst מֵעִ֨ם <WH5973> with יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God בְּחֹרֵ֔ב <WH2722> in Horeb בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> in the day הַקָּהָ֖ל <WH6951> of the assembly לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying לֹ֣א <WH3808> or אֹסֵ֗ף <WH3254> again לִשְׁמֹ֙עַ֙ <WH8085> Let me not hear אֶת־ <WH853> קוֹל֙ <WH6963> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <WH430> my God וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאֵ֨שׁ <WH784> fire הַגְּדֹלָ֥ה <WH1419> this great הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise לֹֽא־ <WH3808> or אֶרְאֶ֥ה <WH7200> neither let me see ע֖וֹד <WH5750> anymore וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or אָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> any more that I die
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about הֵיטִ֖יבוּ <WH3190> unto me They have well אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> they דִּבֵּֽרוּ׃ <WH1696> [spoken that] which they have spoken

נָבִ֨יא <WH5030> a Prophet אָקִ֥ים <WH6965> I will raise them up לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> from מִקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> from among אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <WH251> their brethren כָּמ֑וֹךָ <WH3644> like וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> like unto thee and will put דְבָרַי֙ <WH1697> my words בְּפִ֔יו <WH6310> in his mouth וְדִבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> and he shall speak אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> about אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> i אֲצַוֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH6680> unto them all that I shall command

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> And it shall come to pass [that] whosoever אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יִשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> will not hearken אֶל־ <WH413> to דְּבָרַ֔י <WH1697> unto my words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> which he shall speak בִּשְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> in my name אָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> Myself אֶדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> I will require מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

אַ֣ךְ <WH389> but הַנָּבִ֡יא <WH5030> But the prophet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who יָזִיד֩ <WH2102> which shall presume לְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> to speak דָּבָ֜ר <WH1697> a word בִּשְׁמִ֗י <WH8034> in my name אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not צִוִּיתִיו֙ <WH6680> which I have not commanded לְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> him to speak וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> or that shall speak בְּשֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> in the name אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <WH312> of other וּמֵ֖ת <WH4191> shall die הַנָּבִ֥יא <WH5030> even that prophet הַהֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְכִ֥י <WH3588> for תֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> And if thou say בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <WH3824> in thine heart אֵיכָה֙ <WH349> will we נֵדַ֣ע <WH3045> How shall we know אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> the word אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not דִבְּר֖וֹ <WH1696> hath not spoken יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> When יְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> speaketh הַנָּבִ֜יא <WH5030> When a prophet בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> in the name יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> come הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> if the thing וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יָב֔וֹא <WH935> follow not nor come to pass ה֣וּא <WH1931> that הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> that [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> has not דִבְּר֖וֹ <WH1696> hath not spoken יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which the LORD בְּזָדוֹן֙ <WH2087> it presumptuously דִּבְּר֣וֹ <WH1696> hath spoken הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> [but] the prophet לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תָג֖וּר <WH1481> thou shalt not be afraid מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> at ס
